sections.heading: of Autism Treatment Program Act
sections.text: The purpose of the Autism Treatment Program Act is to provide for the development and administration of a waiver or an amendment to an existing waiver under the medical assistance program established in section 68-903.SourceLaws 2007, LB482, § 2;R.S.1943, (2008), § 85

68-963.Purpose of Autism Treatment Program Act.

The purpose of the Autism Treatment Program Act is to provide for the development and administration of a waiver or an amendment to an existing waiver under the medical assistance program established in section 68-903.

SourceLaws 2007, LB482, § 2;R.S.1943, (2008), § 85-1,139;Laws 2009, LB27, § 3.
